reviewtext: These are great batteries.  I had one set in Nikon F4s and used them for many trips and it is still going and going f0r four years alrady.  Light weight (1/3 the weight and at least 5+ times the power than the Alkaline batteries.  Best of the all, it will not dmage your camera while storing.  A true "everyready"!  HIghtly recommended.
